```{r}
library(RCaucTile)
ec_tile_map()
ec_tile_map(ec_languages,
            feature_column = "morning_greetings")
ec_tile_map(ec_languages,
            feature_column = "morning_greetings",
            title = "Morning greetings (Naccarato, Verhees 2021)")
ec_tile_map(ec_languages,
            feature_column = "morning_greetings",
            fill_by = "language",
            title = "Morning greetings (Naccarato, Verhees 2021)")
```
